content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I would like to offer 800 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is too low for me, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: OK, Mister Schmidt, how about 850 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's still not high enough, Yi-Nuo Wang. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt, I can go up to 900 Euro per month. Is that more acceptable to you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I still believe the price can be higher, Yi-Nuo Wang. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt, I can offer 950 Euro per month. This is my final offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
